name: KINSALE HORROR
description:
Become a hitchhiker for a day.
See what I saw.

After many days hitchhiking you reach your destination - Kinsale, gourmet capital of Ireland.
You're exhausted, hungry and in dire need of a shower.
Your host is nowhere to be found, freezing night approaches and strange things happen after sundown...

https://www.twitter.com/rarykos
https://www.facebook.com/rarykos
